bio:
Betrid Silver-Blood is a Nord woman who lives in Markarth, and is the wife to Thonar Silver-Blood. She has long blonde hair. Betrid is proud and will brag about her husband's importance. Betrid has no qualms about admitting hat she married Thonar for his money. Betrid also has a tendency to flaunt the vast property and influence the Silver-Blood family holds in The Reach.
Betrid can usually be seen reading books in the Treasury House. She will occasionally brag about the Silver-Blood family’s power and influence when conversing with others.
When she was younger, Betrid worked in the Temple of Dibella, under the priestess Hamal.
Quotes:
“We're the only family worth knowing in Markarth. We own everything in this city, even the jail.
"I'm married to Thonar Silver-Blood. Keep that in mind when you're speaking to me."
“My husband Thonar handles all our family's business. He's an important man."
"I married Thonar for the money, and I'm not the least bit ashamed to admit it."
“Thonar is the real head of this family. He may not be the eldest, but all the work that keeps us respected is handled by my Thonar."
"Oh dear, whatever is a girl to do with such fearful brutes about her?"
When speaking to someone she dislikes: "Every time I see you, I imagine a Saber Cat, closing its claws around your face."
name: Betrid Silver-Blood
